title: 9th Circle
description: From the #1 bestselling author in Hard Boiled Mysteries and Police Procedurals comes a new blockbuster, 9th Circle.  Overview: A madman terrorizes Seattle, attempting to recreate the nine circles of hell by using the blood and bodies of the innocent.  Detective Robi Darcmel, a gifted yet troubled savant, is the only man standing in the path of this pathological killer.  As the fate of the Emerald City hangs in the balance, can Darcmel overcome his failings or will Seattle burn to ash?
author: Carolyn McCray
